```{r}

fitControl <- trainControl(method = "cv", number = 10)

lmodel <- train(as.factor(target) ~ ., data = spotify_norm_total, method = "glm", trControl = fitControl, family = "binomial")
summary(lmodel)

l_predict <- predict(lmodel, spotify_norm_total, type = "raw")

confusionMatrix(as.factor(l_predict), as.factor(spotify_norm_total$target), positive = "1")

```
